name: Homemade tomato pasta
description: This is a delicious homemade tomato pasta
instructions: 1. Boil the pasta
2. Cut the tomato
3. Mix the tomato and tomato sauce with the pasta
4. Add olive oil, salt and pepper
5. Add basil leaves on top of the pasta and serve
author: John Doe

name: Homemade cheese cake
description: This is a delicious homemade cheese cake
instructions: 1. Mix the cream cheese and sugar
2. Add the eggs, butter, flour, vanilla extract, lemon juice and sour cream
3. Bake the cake in the oven for 1 hour
4. Let the cake cool down and serve
author: Dabbie Downer

name: ceser salad
description: This is a delicious ceser salad
instructions: 1. Cut the bread into small pieces and fry them in a pan with olive oil and garlic
2. Cut the chicken into small pieces and fry them in a pan with olive oil, salt and pepper
3. Mix the lettuce, chicken, bread and parmesan cheese
4. Add olive oil, salt, pepper and lemon juice
5. Serve the salad
author: Anna Smith

name: Butter chicken
description: This is a delicious butter chicken
instructions: 1. Cut the chicken into small pieces and fry them in a pan with butter, salt and pepper
2. Cut the onion, garlic and ginger into small pieces and fry them in a pan with butter
3. Add the tomato sauce, cream, garam masala, chili powder, salt and pepper
4. Add the chicken and let it cook for 10 minutes
5. Serve the butter chicken with rice
author: John Doe

name: Chocolate cake
description: This is a delicious chocolate cake
instructions: 1. Mix the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder and baking soda
2. Add the eggs, milk, vegetable oil and vanilla extract
3. Add the boiling water and mix it all together
4. Bake the cake in the oven for 30 minutes
5. Let the cake cool down and serve
author: Dabbie Downer

name: Pancakes
instructions: 1. Mix the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt
2. Add the milk, eggs and butter
3. Fry the pancakes in a pan with butter
4. Serve the pancakes with maple syrup
author: Anna Smith
